data.content:
noun
plural -ers
[count] a machine used for mixing things
a handheld mixer
Using an electric mixer, blend the cake batter on medium (speed) for two minutes.
a cement mixer [=a large machine that keeps cement wet and soft by turning until the cement is used]
a drink (such as soda) that does not contain alcohol and that is used in an alcoholic mixed drink
Orange juice is her favorite mixer.
someone who controls the recording of sounds (such as the words and music) that go with a movie or television show
the sound mixer
A good mixer is someone who is comfortable in social situations and can talk easily with other people. A poor mixer is uncomfortable or awkward in social situations.
For a politician, she was not a very good mixer.
He was shy and a poor mixer.
chiefly US :a social gathering to help people in a group meet each other in a friendly and informal way
an informal mixer

Danh từ
máy trộn
a food-mixer
máy trộn thức ăn
người hoà đồng (giỏi hay kém) với người khác
be a good (bad) mixer
là người hoà đồng giỏi (kém) với người khác
chất không phải rượu để hoà với rượu thành thức uống
we've got bitter lemon as mixer
chúng tôi đã dùng chanh đắng làm chất hoà với rượu để pha thức uống
bộ trộn (rađiô)
